description.value: The Character despises a group or organisation that has wronged them. Gain +10 to all Weapon Skill Tests made against this group. The character finds it difficult to back down from a fight with this foe, and must make a Willpower Test to retreat or surrender to them when fighting, unless Massively outnumbered and outclassed. Groups Include: Chaos Space Marines, Daemons, Mutants, Psykers, Xenos (specific), Criminals, Rogue Trader (specific), Pirates, other
